title: Sulli Persona season two up in air after her tragic death
text:
Sulli was the lead actress in series two of Persona (Picture: Jang Se-young/Newsis via AP)

Sulli was filming the second series of Persona prior to her death.

The former f(x) star died on 14 October aged 25, with police suspecting that she took her own life.

It has been revealed that Sulli was in the midst of filming the second episode of the South Korean Netflix series Persona at the time of her death, and was the lead actress of the series following IU’s leading role in season one.

Production company Mystic Story said: ‘As the lead of the second season of Persona, Sulli was in the midst of filming the second segment.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

‘Nothing has been decided yet regarding the reveal of this project.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

They added that they are not considering casting a different actor as they are ‘still in mourning’, and have not discussed the future of the series.

Following on from the first series of Persona, five directors are filming five different stories for the anthology series.

Hwang Soo Ah’s short film is the only segment to be completed thus far.

The first series, which was released in April, featured Sulli’s close friend IU as the main star, playing IU, Eun, Han-na and Ji-eun across the segments Love Set, Collector, Kiss Burn and Walking At Night.

As well as being a popular K-pop star, having debuted as a solo artist this summer, Sulli was an accomplished actress, receiving critical acclaim for her role in To The Beautiful You.

Sulli’s funeral was privately held with friends and family last week, following a public memorial for fans.

The Goblin singer’s cause of death has yet to be officially determined, although a preliminary autopsy ruled out homicide.

description: Sulli was filming season two of Netflix series Persona when she died aged 25.
